ProductInfo.Features:
Professional Grade hardware and software; IR camera powered by color CCD Technology
Including 4 CCD IR Cameras, power supplies, 4 pack security camera extension cable
Records more images per second for extended periods; Smaller file size
Advanced Search Features including graphed recording chart; Program can be minimized to allow DVR to be used for multi tasking; AVI File Back up
Full Remote capabilities, PSTN, LAN, DSL; Cards are Stackable; Multi Station Monitoring - Monitor Multiple DVR's from one location; free surveillance DeCAl, including 1 of 11.5"x8" and 4 of 3"x2"
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Channel PCI DVR Card Security Camera Home Surveillance System with IR Day Night Outdoor CCD Cameras and Camera Power Supply 1R0
